title: Vixxer
author: Vixxer
content: Which mining pool is more profitable to mine with ipollo v1h 950mh/s ，anyone knows

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: What coin do you plan to mine? That will determine the profitability using the equipment. Also what is the average cost of electricity in your location, cheap, medium or expensive?- Jay -

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Vixxer on October 11, 2023, 06:29:55 AMWhich mining pool is more profitable to mine with ipollo v1h 950mh/s ，anyone knows You can not mine bitcoin with a mining machine that is generating just 950 mh/s. This will not mine bitcoin profitably. If you have good electricity that is constant and cheap, you can get yourself something like Bitmain Antminer like S19 pro or stronger one which will generate at least 100 th/s.

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on October 11, 2023, 06:55:19 AMQuote from: Vixxer on October 11, 2023, 06:29:55 AMWhich mining pool is more profitable to mine with ipollo v1h 950mh/s ，anyone knows You can not mine bitcoin with a mining machine that is generating just 950 mh/s. This will not mine bitcoin profitably. If you have good electricity that is constant and cheap, you can get yourself something like Bitmain Antminer like S19 pro or stronger one which will generate at least 100 th/s.He is using a iPollo V1H which doesnt even support SHA256 - he was asking for a pool which supports Ethash as algorithm.You will most likely not profitable with that coin. You can check https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/ipollo/v1h and edit ur electricity costs and see ur result. If you can say which coin you are exactly mining we might get a decent pool for you.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: This unit seems new it was just released in September but most of the coins that you can mine with this unit that are currently profitable with $0.1/kwh are shitcoins according to Whattomine.Since mining shitcoins are risky due to shitexchange I think it's not worth to mine.You can maybe get a better profit if you sell your hashrate on Miningrigrentals or in Nicehash marketplace.
